messages.msgSnippet: ... Thank you-- we re looking forward to working with new people, as well. As I have said to you before, stick to the rules, keep discussions on the board
messages.messageBody:
>I am very happy to say that I am much better and can really do some
>research on my favorite group the Shinsengumi!

Thank you-- we're looking forward to working with new people, as well. As I
have said to you before, stick to the rules, keep discussions on the board
ON-topic, and we'll all be able to benefit.

Thank you.

--M.

messages.subject: Hello
messages.msgSnippet: I just joined this site and am really happy I did, I am also a member of the SHQ spy division. So Hello to all here who don t already know me!

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Hello
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome to the list Ai. I m the resident sword freak on the board ^_^; so if you got any questions feel free to ask. Again, welcome to the list! ~Okita ...
messages.messageBody:
Welcome to the list Ai. I'm the resident sword freak on the board ^_^; so if you got any questions feel free to ask.
Again, welcome to the list!

~Okita
----- Original Message -----
From: fission6000
To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, August 28, 2004 7:26 PM
Subject: [SHQ] Hello


Hi everyone,

I'm new to the Shinsengumi Headquarters, and I just wanted to
introduce myself. My name is Ai, and I'm currently working on a
doujinshi manga about the famous or infamous [depending on how you
look at them ;)] police force. Barbara Sheridan referred me to this
list and the LiveJournal RPG in order to learn some more about the
Shinsengumi, and I'm looking forward to some great discussions. :)

--- Ai

messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Hello
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome aboard, Ai! I m the resident translator (one of a few), Shimazu Masayoshi. I m also working on a manga and novel about the Shinsengumi. We re glad to
messages.messageBody:
Welcome aboard, Ai! I'm the resident translator (one of a few), Shimazu
Masayoshi. I'm also working on a manga and novel about the Shinsengumi.
We're glad to have you!

By the way, who's your favorite Shinsengumi? Mine's Kondou, Nagakura, and
Yoshimura Kanichirou.

--M.

messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I'm new to the Shinsengumi Headquarters, and I just wanted to
introduce myself. My name is Ai, and I'm currently working on a
doujinshi manga about the famous or infamous [depending on how you
look at them ;)] police force. Barbara Sheridan referred me to this
list and the LiveJournal RPG in order to learn some more about the
Shinsengumi, and I'm looking forward to some great discussions. :)

--- Ai
